This Activity is a Class or a Camp

Activities that are re-occuring, or are charged per person.

This Activity is a Service

Activities that charge per item, i.e. 1 bowling lane.

Title is required.

Title must be less than 65

Price is required.

Price must be less than 9999.99

Service Unit is required.

Service Units can't be more than 12 characters

Description is required.

Description can't be more than 192 characters
